 44:     """


 45:     total_flux(flux, segm)


 46: 


 47:     `segm` is a segmentation image with intensities defined in the `flux` image`.


 48: 


 49:     Return an array, `total_flux`, where


 50:         total_flux[i] = sum(flux[where(segm == i)])


 51: 


 52:     Note that there will be zero-valued entries in the output arrays where


 53:     there were no pixels with that index number in the segmentation image.


 54:     """
